name: Latlong2district
tagline: Given a pair of [lat, long], return related information.
body:
### 經緯度轉區里
先下載放在google drive的「村里界圖(TWD97經緯度)1050715.zip」，並解壓縮。

```{r}
library(rgdal)
library(dplyr)
pathFolder <- "/Users/kaishentseng/Documents/DataHero-Fire/data/村里界圖(TWD97經緯度)1050715"
tw <- readOGR(dsn = pathFolder, layer = "Village_NLSC_1050715", encoding = "big5")

kaohsiung <- tw[tw$C_Name=="高雄市" & !tw$V_Name %in% c(c("高雄港", "軍事用地")),] 

li <- SpatialPolygons(kaohsiung@polygons)

# EX
latlong <- matrix(c(120.297198, 22.641327, 
                    120.638338, 22.994389), ncol = 2, byrow = T)
colnames(latlong) <- c("x", "y")
rownames(latlong) <- c("addr_a", "addr_b")
print(latlong)
addrs <- SpatialPoints(latlong)


district_li <- paste(kaohsiung$T_Name, kaohsiung$V_Name, sep = "-")
result <- district_li[over(addrs, li)]
```

note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
